SCOPE & STOP Hormones Analysis 01 November 2022 Overview This page contains analysis results for SCOPE and STOP Hormones. Absorbance Concentrations: Standard curves

1 Standard Curves This section contains standard curves fitted for Prolactin, HPL, and GH2. GH2 Plate 22 (28-2-22) omitted due to invalid standard curve. Inter-assay CV for Prolactin and HPL higher than recommended 15%. According to the protocols, the following methods were used for curve fitting: - Prolactin: Quadratic - HPL: 4-parameter Logistic - GH2: non-linear splines

2 Plate Effect This section explores the Plate effect on hormone levels. Outcomes: Prolactin, hPL, GH2 (all outcomes log-transformed) Independent variables: Plate + Study, BMI, GA at sampling Model fitted: LME model       log(hormones) ~ Plate + Study + BMI + GA at sampling       Random intercepts for Study ID There is evidence of a Plate effect and it will be adjusted for (as a random effect) in the analyses.
